scripts.dev: python3 -m http.server 5173 -d public || python -m http.server 5173 -d public
scripts.check:files: bash -lc 'for f in public/index.html public/paso-1.html public/paso-2.html public/paso-3.html public/paso-4.html public/sociograma.html; do test -f $f || (echo Missing $f; exit 1); done'
scripts.check:csv: bash -lc 'h1=$(head -n1 src/data/sample-edges.csv | sed s/[[:space:]]//g); test "$h1" = "pregunta,from_legajo,to_legajo,weight" || (echo Bad\ edges\ header:\ $h1; exit 1); h2=$(head -n1 src/data/sample-people.csv | sed s/[[:space:]]//g); test "$h2" = "legajo,nombre,apellido,area,sector,rol" || (echo Bad\ people\ header:\ $h2; exit 1)'
scripts.check:json: bash -lc 'jq -e type src/data/sample-responses.json >/dev/null && jq -e "all(.[]; has(\"id\") and has(\"legajo\") and has(\"edges\"))" src/data/sample-responses.json >/dev/null'
scripts.validate: npm run check:files && npm run check:csv && npm run check:json
